sqlMap.select: select S10, WAIBGHMS, S3, CANGKDM, SHIFYLKC, UABZUCLX, XUQCFRQ, FAYZQ, S1, KUC, JIAOFM, usercenter, S9, GONGYSDM, DINGDLJ, SHIFYLDJF, S5, SHIFYLDXH, ANQKC, GONGYSLX, BEIHZQ, DINGDNR, S7, UABZLX, ID, XITTZZ, UABZUCSL, ZHIDGYS, DAIXH, JIAOFLJ, UABZUCRL, to_char(ZIYHQRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd'), baozrl, S4, LINGJBH, SHIFYLAQKC, ZHIZLX, S6, S8, LUJDM, S0ZXH, S0, S2, GONGYSFE, JIHYZ, TIAOZJSZ, DANW, YUGSFQZ, DINGDZZLJ, FAHD, LINGJSX, ZUIXQDL, lingjmc, gongsmc, neibyhzx, DINGHCJ, wulgyyz, XIEHZTBH, wulgyyz1, gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsc where 1=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsc ( S10, WAIBGHMS, S3, CANGKDM, SHIFYLKC, UABZUCLX, XUQCFRQ, FAYZQ, S1, KUC, JIAOFM, usercenter, S9, GONGYSDM, DINGDLJ, SHIFYLDJF, S5, SHIFYLDXH, ANQKC, GONGYSLX, BEIHZQ, DINGDNR, S7, UABZLX, ID, XITTZZ, UABZUCSL, ZHIDGYS, DAIXH, JIAOFLJ, UABZUCRL, ZIYHQRQ, baozrl, S4, LINGJBH, SHIFYLAQKC, ZHIZLX, S6, S8, LUJDM, S0ZXH, S0, S2, GONGYSFE, JIHYZ, TIAOZJSZ, DANW, YUGSFQZ, DINGHCJ, DINGDZZLJ, FAHD, ZUIXQDL, CANGKLX, lingjmc, gongsmc, neibyhzx, LINGJSX, wulgyyz, XIEHZTBH, wulgyyz1, gcbh) values( #s10#, #waibghms#, #s3#, #cangkdm#, #shifylkc#, #uabzuclx#, to_date(substr(#xuqcfrq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #fayzq#, #s1#, #kuc#, #jiaofm#, #usercenter#, #s9#, #gongysdm#, #dingdlj#, #shifyldjf#, #s5#, #shifyldxh#, #anqkc#, #gongyslx#, #beihzq#, #dingdnr#, #s7#, #uabzlx#, ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC_SEQ.nextval, #xittzz#, #uabzucsl#, #zhidgys#, #daixh#, #jiaoflj#, #uabzucrl#, to_date(substr(#ziyhqrq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #baozrl#, #s4#, #lingjbh#, #shifylaqkc#, #zhizlx#, #s6#, #s8#, #lujdm#, #s0zxh#, #s0#, #s2#, #gongysfe#, #jihyz#, #tiaozjsz#, #danw#, #yugsfqz#, #dinghcj#, #dingdzzlj#, #fahd#, #zuixqdl#, #cangklx#, #lingjmc#, #gongsmc#, #neibyhzx#, #lingjsx#, #wulgyyz#, #xiehztbh#, #wulgyyz1#, #gcbh#)
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsc set S10=#s10#, WAIBGHMS=#waibghms#, S3=#s3#, CANGKDM=#cangkdm#, SHIFYLKC=#shifylkc#, UABZUCLX=#uabzuclx#, XUQCFRQ=#xuqcfrq#, FAYZQ=#fayzq#, S1=#s1#, KUC=#kuc#, JIAOFM=#jiaofm#, usercenter=#usercenter#, S9=#s9#, GONGYSDM=#gongysdm#, DINGDLJ=#dingdlj#, SHIFYLDJF=#shifyldjf#, S5=#s5#, SHIFYLDXH=#shifyldxh#, ANQKC=#anqkc#, GONGYSLX=#gongyslx#, BEIHZQ=#beihzq#, DINGDNR=#dingdnr#, S7=#s7#, UABZLX=#uabzlx#, ID=#id#, XITTZZ=#xittzz#, UABZUCSL=#uabzucsl#, ZHIDGYS=#zhidgys#, DAIXH=#daixh#, JIAOFLJ=#jiaoflj#, UABZUCRL=#uabzucrl#, ZIYHQRQ=#ziyhqrq#, baozrl=#baozrl#, S4=#s4#, LINGJBH=#lingjbh#, SHIFYLAQKC=#shifylaqkc#, ZHIZLX=#zhizlx#, S6=#s6#, S8=#s8#, LUJDM=#lujdm#, S0ZXH=#s0zxh#, S0=#s0#, S2=#s2#, GONGYSFE=#gongysfe#, JIHYZ=#jihyz#, TIAOZJSZ=#tiaozjsz#, DANW=#danw#, YUGSFQZ=#ygsfqz#, DINGDZZLJ=#dingdzzlj#, FAHD=#fahd#, LINGJSX=#lingjsx#, ZUIXQDL=#zuixqdl#, DINGHCJ=#dinghcj# where 1=1
ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select hzb.usercenter, hzb.xuqcfrq, hzb.lingjbh, hzb.zhizlx, hzb.danw, hzb.s0, hzb.s1, hzb.s2, hzb.s3, hzb.s4, hzb.s5, hzb.s6, hzb.s7, hzb.s8, hzb.s9, hzb.s10, hzb.s0zxh as S0ZXH, hzb.cangkdm, clj.dinghcj, clk.ANQKCSL as anqkc, ( select sum(kucsl) as kucsl from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb zykz where zykz.ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and zykz.usercenter = hzb.usercenter and zykz.lingjbh = hzb.lingjbh and zykz.cangkdm in (
select distinct
dinghck as cangkdm from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ wl where mudd = hzb.cangkdm
and zhizlx = '97W' and waibms = 'PS' and zykz.lingjbh = wl.lingjbh and zykz.usercenter = wl.usercenter union all ( select distinct xianbck as cangkdm from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ wl where mudd = hzb.cangkdm and zhizlx = '97W' and waibms = 'PS' and zykz.lingjbh = wl.lingjbh and zykz.usercenter = wl.usercenter ) ) )
as KUC, hzb.gongysbh as GONGYSDM, cg.leix as GONGYSLX, hzb.beihzq, hzb.yunszq as FAYZQ, hzb.gongyfe as GONGYSFE, clk.JISTZZ as TIAOZJSZ, clg.uabzlx as UABZLX, clg.ucbzlx as UABZUCLX, clg.ucrl as UABZUCRL, clg.uaucgs as UABZUCSL, clg.uaucgs * clg.ucrl as BAOZRL, to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as ziyhqrq, hzb.waibms as WAIBGHMS, nvl(temp.shifylkc, 1) as shifylkc, nvl(temp.shifylaqkc, 1) as shifylaqkc, nvl(temp.shifyldjf, 1) as shifyldjf, nvl(temp.shifyldxh, 1) as shifyldxh, clj.jihy as jihyz, hzb.lujbh as LUJDM, zy.DINGDLJ as DINGDLJ, zy.JIAOFLJ as JIAOFLJ, zy.XTTZZ as XITTZZ, hzb.zhidgys as ZHIDGYS, clg.zuixqdl as ZUIXQDL, hzb.jiaofm, nvl(temp.yugsfqz, 1) as yugsfqz, zy.DINGDZZLJ as DINGDZZLJ, clg.gongyhth, hzb.shiycj, clj.lingjsx, hzb.fahd, clj.zhongwmc as lingjmc, cg.gongsmc, cg.NEIBYHZX, hzb.cangklx as cangklx, clk.XIEHZTBH, hzb.gcbh from (select zjb.usercenter, zjb.xuqcfrq, zjb.lingjbh, zjb.zhizlx, zjb.danw, nvl(sum((zjb.s0 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s0, nvl(sum((zjb.s1 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s1, nvl(sum((zjb.s2 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s2, nvl(sum((zjb.s3 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s3, nvl( sum((zjb.s4 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s4, nvl(sum((zjb.s5 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s5, nvl(sum((zjb.s6 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s6, nvl(sum((zjb.s7 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s7, nvl(sum((zjb.s8 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s8, nvl(sum((zjb.s9 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s9, nvl(sum((zjb.s10 * cl.xiaohbl)),0) as s10, zjb.s0zxh, zjb.cangkdm, zjb.gongysbh, zjb.beihzq, zjb.yunszq, zjb.gongyfe, zjb.waibms, zjb.lujbh, zjb.zhidgys, zjb.jiaofm, zjb.shiycj, zjb.fahd, zjb.cangklx, zjb.gcbh from (select m.xuqcfrq, m.usercenter, m.lingjbh, cw.shengcxbh, cw.fenpqh as fenpxh, m.zhizlx, m.danw, m.s0, m.s1, m.s2, m.s3, m.s4, m.s5, m.s6, m.s7, m.s8, m.s9, m.s10,
m.s0zxh, case when cw.dinghck is null then cw.xianbck else cw.dinghck end as cangkdm, cw.gongysbh, cw.beihzq, cw.yunszq, cw.fenpqh, cw.gongyfe, cw.waibms, cw.lujbh, cw.zhidgys, cw.jiaofm, m.shiycj, cw.fahd, case when cw.dinghck is null then 0 else 1 end as cangklx, cw.gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzs m, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ cw where m.usercenter = cw.usercenter(+) and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh(+) and m.chanx = cw.shengcxbh(+) and m.zhizlx = cw.zhizlx(+) and cw.waibms = 'PS' and m.waibms = 'PS' ) zjb, ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd cl where zjb.usercenter = cl.usercenter(+) and zjb.lingjbh = cl.lingjbh(+) and zjb.fenpxh = cl.fenpqbh(+) and zjb.shengcxbh = cl.shengcxbh(+) and cl.biaos = '1' group by zjb.usercenter, zjb.xuqcfrq, zjb.usercenter, zjb.lingjbh, zjb.zhizlx, zjb.danw, zjb.s0zxh, zjb.cangkdm, zjb.gongysbh, zjb.beihzq, zjb.gongyfe, zjb.waibms, zjb.lujbh, zjb.zhidgys, zjb.jiaofm, zjb.shiycj, zjb.fahd, zjb.yunszq, zjb.cangklx, zjb.gcbh) hzb, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos = '1') cg, (select t.gongysbh, t.waibghms as waibghms, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YQZ', '0', null, '1', '1')) as yugsfqz, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YKC', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifylkc, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YAC', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifylaqkc, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YJF', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifyldjf, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YXH', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifyldxh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_dingdjsyl t group by t.gongysbh, t.waibghms) temp, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJ where biaos = '1') clj, (select * from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb where ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) zy, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}Ckx_Lingjgys where biaos = '1' ) clg, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJCK clk where hzb.usercenter = cg.usercenter(+) and hzb.gongysbh = cg.gcbh(+) and hzb.zhizlx = cg.GONGHLX(+) and hzb.gongysbh = temp.gongysbh(+) and hzb.waibms = temp.waibghms(+) and hzb.usercenter = clj.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clj.lingjbh(+)
and hzb.usercenter = clg.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clg.lingjbh(+) and hzb.gongysbh = clg.gongysbh(+) and hzb.usercenter = clk.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clk.lingjbh(+) and hzb.cangkdm = clk.cangkbh(+) and hzb.usercenter = zy.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = zy.lingjbh(+) and hzb.cangkdm = zy.CANGKDM(+)
union (
select usercenter, xuqcfrq, lingjbh, zhizlx, danw, sum(s0) as s0, sum(s1) as s1, sum(s2) as s2, sum(s3) as s3, sum(s4) as s4, sum(s5) as s5, sum(s6) as s6, sum(s7) as s7, sum(s8) as s8, sum(s9) as s9, sum(s10) as s10, S0ZXH, cangkdm, dinghcj, anqkc, KUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, beihzq, FAYZQ, GONGYSFE, TIAOZJSZ, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCRL, UABZUCSL, BAOZRL, ziyhqrq, WAIBGHMS, shifylkc, shifylaqkc, shifyldjf, shifyldxh, jihyz, LUJDM, DINGDLJ, JIAOFLJ, XITTZZ, ZHIDGYS, ZUIXQDL, jiaofm, yugsfqz, DINGDZZLJ, gongyhth, '' as shiycj, lingjsx, fahd, lingjmc, gongsmc, NEIBYHZX, CANGKLX, XIEHZTBH, gcbh from (
select hzb.usercenter, hzb.xuqcfrq, hzb.lingjbh, hzb.zhizlx, hzb.danw, hzb.s0, hzb.s1, hzb.s2, hzb.s3, hzb.s4, hzb.s5, hzb.s6, hzb.s7, hzb.s8, hzb.s9, hzb.s10, hzb.s0zxh as S0ZXH, hzb.cangkdm, clj.dinghcj, clk.ANQKCSL as anqkc, z.kucsl as KUC, hzb.gongysbh as GONGYSDM, cg.leix as GONGYSLX, hzb.beihzq, hzb.yunszq as FAYZQ, hzb.gongyfe as GONGYSFE, clk.JISTZZ as TIAOZJSZ, clg.uabzlx as UABZLX, clg.ucbzlx as UABZUCLX, clg.ucrl as UABZUCRL, clg.uaucgs as UABZUCSL, clg.uaucgs * clg.ucrl as BAOZRL, to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as ziyhqrq, hzb.waibms as WAIBGHMS, nvl(temp.shifylkc, 1) as shifylkc, nvl(temp.shifylaqkc, 1) as shifylaqkc, nvl(temp.shifyldjf, 1) as shifyldjf, nvl(temp.shifyldxh, 1) as shifyldxh, clj.jihy as jihyz, hzb.lujbh as LUJDM, zy.DINGDLJ as DINGDLJ, zy.JIAOFLJ as JIAOFLJ, zy.XTTZZ as XITTZZ, hzb.zhidgys as ZHIDGYS, clg.zuixqdl as ZUIXQDL, hzb.jiaofm, nvl(temp.yugsfqz, 1) as yugsfqz, zy.DINGDZZLJ as DINGDZZLJ, clg.gongyhth, hzb.shiycj, clj.lingjsx, hzb.fahd, clj.zhongwmc as lingjmc, cg.gongsmc, cg.NEIBYHZX, hzb.cangklx as cangklx, clk.XIEHZTBH, hzb.gcbh from (select zjb.usercenter, zjb.xuqcfrq, zjb.lingjbh, zjb.zhizlx, zjb.danw, nvl(sum(zjb.s0 ),0) as s0, nvl(sum(zjb.s1),0) as s1, nvl(sum(zjb.s2 ),0) as s2, nvl(sum(zjb.s3),0) as s3, nvl( sum(zjb.s4),0) as s4, nvl(sum(zjb.s5 ),0) as s5, nvl(sum(zjb.s6 ),0) as s6, nvl(sum(zjb.s7),0) as s7, nvl(sum(zjb.s8),0) as s8, nvl(sum(zjb.s9),0) as s9, nvl(sum(zjb.s10 ),0) as s10, zjb.s0zxh, zjb.cangkdm, zjb.gongysbh, zjb.beihzq, zjb.yunszq, zjb.gongyfe, zjb.waibms, zjb.lujbh, zjb.zhidgys, zjb.jiaofm, zjb.shiycj, zjb.fahd, zjb.cangklx, zjb.gcbh from (select m.xuqcfrq, m.usercenter, m.lingjbh,
m.zhizlx, m.danw, m.s0, m.s1, m.s2, m.s3, m.s4, m.s5, m.s6, m.s7, m.s8, m.s9, m.s10,
m.s0zxh, '' as cangkdm, cw.gongysbh, cw.beihzq, cw.yunszq,
cw.gongyfe, cw.waibms, cw.lujbh, cw.zhidgys, cw.jiaofm, m.shiycj, cw.fahd,
1 as cangklx, cw.gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzs m, (SELECT distinct USERCENTER,'' as GCBH ,fahd,'' as jiaofm,gongysbh,'' as zhidgys,1 as beihzq,1 as yunszq,gongyfe,'' as lujbh,'NS' as waibms,LINGJBH,ZHIZLX FROM ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj where waibms != 'PS' ) cw where m.usercenter = cw.usercenter(+) and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh(+)
and m.zhizlx = cw.zhizlx(+) and m.waibms != 'PS' ) zjb group by zjb.usercenter, zjb.xuqcfrq,
zjb.lingjbh, zjb.zhizlx, zjb.danw, zjb.s0zxh, zjb.cangkdm, zjb.gongysbh, zjb.beihzq, zjb.gongyfe, zjb.waibms, zjb.lujbh, zjb.zhidgys, zjb.jiaofm, zjb.shiycj, zjb.fahd, zjb.yunszq, zjb.cangklx, zjb.gcbh) hzb, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos = '1') cg, (select t.gongysbh, t.waibghms as waibghms, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YQZ', '0', null, '1', '1')) as yugsfqz, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YKC', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifylkc, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YAC', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifylaqkc, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YJF', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifyldjf, min(decode(t.yilgx, 'YXH', '0', null, '1', '1')) as shifyldxh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_dingdjsyl t group by t.gongysbh, t.waibghms) temp, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJ where biaos = '1') clj, ( select sum(kucsl) as kucsl, usercenter, lingjbh from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb zykz where ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and zykz.cangkdm in (
select distinct
dinghck as cangkdm from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ wl where dinghck is not null and zhizlx = '97W' and zykz.lingjbh = wl.lingjbh and zykz.usercenter = wl.usercenter union all ( select distinct xianbck as cangkdm from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ wl where xianbck is not null and zhizlx = '97W' and zykz.lingjbh = wl.lingjbh and zykz.usercenter = wl.usercenter )
)
group by usercenter, lingjbh
) z, (select * from ${dbSchemal3}Ckx_Lingjgys where biaos = '1' ) clg, (select * from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb where ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) zy, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJCK clk where hzb.usercenter = cg.usercenter(+) and hzb.gongysbh = cg.gcbh(+) and hzb.zhizlx = cg.GONGHLX(+) and hzb.gongysbh = temp.gongysbh(+) and hzb.waibms = temp.waibghms(+) and hzb.usercenter = clj.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clj.lingjbh(+) and hzb.usercenter = z.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = z.lingjbh(+)
and hzb.usercenter = clg.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clg.lingjbh(+) and hzb.gongysbh = clg.gongysbh(+) and hzb.usercenter = clk.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = clk.lingjbh(+) and hzb.cangkdm = clk.cangkbh(+) and hzb.usercenter = zy.usercenter(+) and hzb.lingjbh = zy.lingjbh(+) and hzb.cangkdm = zy.CANGKDM(+)
) group by usercenter, lingjbh, xuqcfrq, S0ZXH, cangkdm, dinghcj, anqkc, KUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, beihzq, FAYZQ, GONGYSFE, TIAOZJSZ, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCRL, UABZUCSL, BAOZRL, ziyhqrq, WAIBGHMS, shifylkc, shifylaqkc, shifyldjf, shifyldxh, jihyz, LUJDM, DINGDLJ, JIAOFLJ, XITTZZ, ZHIDGYS, ZUIXQDL, jiaofm, yugsfqz, DINGDZZLJ, gongyhth,
lingjsx, fahd, lingjmc, gongsmc, NEIBYHZX, CANGKLX, XIEHZTBH, gcbh, zhizlx, danw
)

select id, usercenter, lingjbh, zhizlx, jihyz from (
select m.id, lj.jihy as jihyz, m.xuqcfrq, m.usercenter, m.lingjbh, cw.shengcxbh, cw.fenpqh as fenpxh, m.zhizlx, m.danw, m.s0, m.s1, m.s2, m.s3, m.s4, m.s5, m.s6, m.s7, m.s8, m.s9, m.s10,
m.s0zxh, case when cw.dinghck is null then cw.xianbck else cw.dinghck end as cangkdm, cw.gongysbh, cw.beihzq, cw.yunszq, cw.fenpqh, cw.gongyfe, cw.waibms, cw.lujbh, cw.zhidgys, cw.jiaofm, m.shiycj, cw.fahd, case when cw.dinghck is null then 0 else 1 end as cangklx, cw.gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzs m, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ cw ,${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj lj where m.usercenter = cw.usercenter(+) and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh(+) and m.chanx = cw.shengcxbh(+) and m.zhizlx = cw.zhizlx(+) and m.usercenter = lj.usercenter (+) and m.lingjbh = lj.lingjbh (+) and m.waibms = 'PS' ) where shengcxbh is null

select S10, WAIBGHMS, S3, CANGKDM, SHIFYLKC, UABZUCLX, XUQCFRQ, FAYZQ, S1, KUC, JIAOFM, usercenter, S9, GONGYSDM, DINGDLJ, SHIFYLDJF, S5, SHIFYLDXH, ANQKC, GONGYSLX, BEIHZQ, DINGDNR, S7, UABZLX, ID, XITTZZ, UABZUCSL, ZHIDGYS, DAIXH, JIAOFLJ, UABZUCRL, ZIYHQRQ, baozrl, S4, LINGJBH, SHIFYLAQKC, ZHIZLX, S6, S8, LUJDM, S0ZXH, S0, S2, GONGYSFE, JIHYZ, TIAOZJSZ, DANW, YUGSFQZ, DINGDZZLJ, DINGHCJ, FAHD, LINGJSX, lingjmc, gongsmc, neibyhzx, ZUIXQDL, XIEHZTBH, gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsc where 1=1
WAIBGHMS = #waibghms#
order by usercenter, lingjbh, cangkdm

select S10, WAIBGHMS, S3, CANGKDM, SHIFYLKC, UABZUCLX, XUQCFRQ, FAYZQ, S1, KUC, JIAOFM, usercenter, S9, GONGYSDM, DINGDLJ, SHIFYLDJF, S5, SHIFYLDXH, ANQKC, GONGYSLX, BEIHZQ, DINGDNR, S7, UABZLX, ID, XITTZZ, UABZUCSL, ZHIDGYS, DAIXH, JIAOFLJ, UABZUCRL, ZIYHQRQ, baozrl, S4, LINGJBH, SHIFYLAQKC, ZHIZLX, S6, S8, LUJDM, S0ZXH, S0, S2, GONGYSFE, JIHYZ, TIAOZJSZ, DANW, YUGSFQZ, DINGDZZLJ, DINGHCJ, FAHD, LINGJSX, lingjmc, gongsmc, neibyhzx, ZUIXQDL, XIEHZTBH, gcbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsc where 1=1
WAIBGHMS != #waibghms#

select distinct x.kucsl from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_ziykzb x,${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsfpxh t where x.lingjbh = #lingjbh# and x.cangkdm = #cangkdm# and x.ziyhqrq = to_date(substr(#ziyhqrq#,1,10) ,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select sum(distinct x.kucsl) from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_ziykzb x, ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj cw,${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzsfpxh t where cw.dinghck= #cangkdm# and x.lingjbh= #lingjbh# and cw.lingjbh = #lingjbh# and x.ziyhqrq = to_date(substr(#ziyhqrq#,1,10) ,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select * from (select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz, sum(t.gongysfe) as fene from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.waibghms = 'PS' group by t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.cangkdm,t.jihyz) ad where ad.fene !='1' or ad.fene is null

select * from (select ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh, sum(ad.gongyfe) as fene from (select distinct cw.usercenter, cw.lingjbh, cw.gongysbh, cw.gongyfe from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC m,${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ cw where m.usercenter = cw.usercenter and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh and m.gongysdm = cw.gongysbh) ad group by ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh) where fene != '1' or fene is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.zhizlx is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.gongysdm is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.dinghcj is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.beihzq is null or t.beihzq <=0
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.fayzq is null or t.fayzq <=0
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.ziyhqrq is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.lujdm is null and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.wulgyyz1 from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.cangkdm is null and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.wulgyyz1 from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.uabzlx is null and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.wulgyyz1 from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.uabzuclx is null and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.wulgyyz1 from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where (t.uabzucsl is null or t.uabzucsl <=0) and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.wulgyyz1 from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where (t.uabzucrl is null or t.uabzucrl <=0) and t.waibghms = 'PS'
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.waibghms is null
select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.gongysdm, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.jihyz is null
sqlMap.delete: delete from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.lingjbh in (select ad.lingjbh from (select t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.cangkdm, t.jihyz, sum(t.gongysfe) as fene from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.waibghms = 'PS' group by t.usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.danw, t.cangkdm,t.jihyz) ad where ad.fene !='1' or ad.fene is null)

delete from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.lingjbh in ( select lingjbh from (select ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh, sum(ad.gongyfe) as fene from (select distinct cw.usercenter, cw.lingjbh, cw.gongysbh, cw.gongyfe from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC m,${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ cw where m.usercenter = cw.usercenter and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh and m.gongysdm = cw.gongysbh) ad group by ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh) where fene != '1' or fene is null )

delete from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_MAOXQHZSC t where t.zhizlx is null or t.gongysdm is null or t.dinghcj is null or t.beihzq is null or t.beihzq <= 0 or t.fayzq is null or t.fayzq <=0 or t.ziyhqrq is null or (t.lujdm is null and t.waibghms = 'PS') or (t.cangkdm is null and t.waibghms = 'PS') or (t.uabzlx is null and t.waibghms = 'PS' ) or (t.uabzuclx is null and t.waibghms = 'PS') or ((t.uabzucsl is null or t.uabzucsl <=0 ) and t.waibghms = 'PS') or ((t.uabzucrl is null or t.uabzucrl <=0 ) and t.waibghms = 'PS') or t.waibghms is null or t.jihyz is null or t.gongysfe is null or t.gongysfe <0
